##Help us to help Australia!
We started our Australian Aid Promotion to assist with the bushfire crisis. Any orders placed using the voucher code “BUSHFIRES” will have the value of their first months order donated to pre-selected charities. Additional information can be found on our [news post](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/news/help-us-donate-to-assist-australian-charities-with-the-bushfire-crisis/).

##What sets us apart?
-Juniper only network with new equipment.
-Over 1Tbps of network capacity with N+1 resiliency at minimum and diverse routing.
-On premise Corero DDoS mitigation appliances in each location.
-Great peering at LINX, LONAP, AMS-IX, DE-CIX and all major local ISP's.
-We transit with: Level3, Telia, NTT, GTT, TATA, ZAYO and Cogent which guarantees excellent congestion free connectivity.
-LINX, LONAP, AMS-IX & DE-CIX partner - we can connect you to these exchanges with your own ASN.
-EU MPLS Network Spread over 7 datacenters.
-Tier 3 Datacentres in London, Amsterdam & Frankfurt.
-We aim at high quality for a reasonable price.
-Clouvider is an established UK based business. We just turned 6!

##What’s new?
-[We recently expanded into both Amsterdam, NL and Frankfurt, DE](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/news/opening-of-new-pops-in-amsterdam-nl-and-frankfurt-de/).
-Latest generation Intel Xeon E based servers now in stock.
-[On-premise DDoS filtering appliances from Corero](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/ddos-protection/) & Implementation of our dual-stage DDoS mitigation platform.

##FAQ’s:

#####Can these servers be customised?
Yes, we have several options during the checkout process. If you seek a different configuration please contact us.

#####Can I check your network?
Yes, our LookingGlass can be found at [https://as62240.net/](https://as62240.net/), alternatively you can use the following test IP’s:
185.42.223.63 - London, UK
194.127.172.33 - Amsterdam, NL
91.199.118.14 - Frankfurt, DE

#####How long for deployment?
Our standard delivery is within 3 working days, custom/bespoke configurations may take longer.

#####How do I activate IPMI/iGPU features?
Open a ticket with our support team requesting configuration.

#####Is Free DirectAdmin available?
Yes, free [DirectAdmin licenses](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/software-licensing/directadmin/) can be issued for any services on our network.

#####Do you announce my own IP's?
Yes, we can announce your own IP Space for use on dedicated servers with us free of charge.

#####Do you offer BGP Session?
Yes, BGP Sessions can be configured on our dedicated servers free of charge.

#####Do you offer IPv6?
Yes, /64 or /48 subnets can be requested during the order process.

#####Can you accommodate x, y or z?
Open a sales ticket to discuss our custom solutions, happy to help where possible.

##Any questions or queries? 
Contact our team today at [https://www.clouvider.co.uk/contact/](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/contact/).

All prices are exclusive of VAT where applicable. Stock is limited and the offers are valid subject to stock remaining. Because of the limited stock, if the order is not paid within an hour, it will be regretfully canceled and the stock returned to the pool for others to enjoy.
